school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)

comments: She is clear as day when it comes to what she expects and what\'s on the test. The easiest but most interesting class I\'ve taken so far. Definitely take her, just study the lectures before class.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She\'s boring but knows her stuff. You need to pay attention and read the textbook. She takes attendance, only 3 tests and 5 articles by the end of the semester. My he first test was multiple choice and short answers but the class did poorly so she only made it multiple choice for the other tests. She\'s very nice. Would recommend. Just study.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)

comments: This professor is fine, even her accent is not that bad. However, you really have to work hard to receive a good grade. No presentations, three exams and 5 articles in the end of the semester.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She is a great professor. If you read the chapters before the test then you will get a good grade. Do not expect to get an easy A in her class, you do have to do the work. You will have two tests and final will be the group project that requires presenting it.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Let me start by saying she is a very nice lady, but lacks proper teaching techniques. This is the first time she is teaching this and is not doing a great job at it. Her lectures are really boring and drag on. We have to do a presentation which is basically a big case study. Exams were tough especially the final, it was a killer

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: One of the most organized professors you will ever meet. She is always on time and easy to talk to. Her lecture\'s are clear and concise. Also, her syllabus is on schedule. Her class is pretty straight forward: study and you\'ll get an A.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Overall, she is the average teacher. I don\'t think she makes the class on a personal level as I would like, but she does teach the subject matter and knows her stuff. I think I disagree with her style of teaching how to make presentations, but it\'s better than never learning how to publicly speak

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Great teacher, she is one of those very helpful teachers who always responds to emails and has very straight forward tests. This is college, so if you can study and put a decent effort in you\'ll have no problem in her class. I\'d highly recomend this teacher to everyone.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
